info.description: Authentication event logs for security and audit purposes

userId.description: ID of the user associated with this log entry

ipAddress.description: IP address of the client (IPv6 compatible)

success.description: Whether the authentication action was successful

errorMessage.description: Error message if the action failed

metadata.description: Additional metadata about the authentication event
